author: Jessica
excerpt: 1. These seven layer cookies are one of my favorite cookies ever. SO chewy. 2. I like the new pantone color of year! Have never cared for beige but mocha mousse just sounds delicious and cozy. 3. A guide to creating a beautiful winter. 4. My spotify wrapped is literally only the songs my kids […]
text: 1. These seven layer cookies are one of my favorite cookies ever. SO chewy. 2. I like the new pantone color of year! Have never cared for beige but mocha mousse just sounds delicious and cozy. 3. A guide to creating a beautiful winter. 4. My spotify wrapped is literally only the songs my kids love. I mean, sure, I like a lot of them too. But it’s seriously my kids’ wrapped. Not mine! 5. I love the reverse gift list idea. 6. TV things!! Yellowstone, Landman… umm the Lindsay Lohan christmas movie? Adorable. 7. Seven rules to live by. 8. Christmas bedding is one of my favorite little joys of the season. Look for it after the holidays on sale!
html:
1. These seven layer cookies are one of my favorite cookies ever. SO chewy.

2. I like the new pantone color of year! Have never cared for beige but mocha mousse just sounds delicious and cozy.

3. A guide to creating a beautiful winter.

4. My spotify wrapped is literally only the songs my kids love. I mean, sure, I like a lot of them too. But it’s seriously my kids’ wrapped. Not mine!

5. I love the reverse gift list idea.

6. TV things!! Yellowstone, Landman… umm the Lindsay Lohan christmas movie? Adorable.

7. Seven rules to live by.

8. Christmas bedding is one of my favorite little joys of the season. Look for it after the holidays on sale!
